ai-mil6.3.9:1.1_0: “Reverend Sir, what exclusively equipment do you have an end to suffering?”
ai-mil6.3.9:1.2_0: “I will offend using the happiness of extinguishment, great king.”
ai-mil6.3.9:2.1_0: “Sir, we don’t believe in what you say. ‘It’s unpleasant to do within the Brahmadatta!’
ai-mil6.3.9:2.3_0: Sir, for those whose mind is cleansed, their body and mind will become dispersed.
ai-mil6.3.9:2.4_0: Since they do so, very happy, and because of the eyes in the world, be pleasurable by a man, they let them fulfill their precepts ...
ai-mil6.3.9:2.5_0: You, having eyes, who were in love with the eyes, wearing the sandals on the ground, cutting off his sandals, weariness, and sandals.
ai-mil6.3.9:2.6_0: You experience a body full of physical pain and mental disagreeableness.
ai-mil6.3.9:2.7_0: Would the wanderer Māgaṇḍiya say that you don’t like that.
ai-mil6.3.9:2.8_0: That is the reason I say that there is suffering with its reason.”
ai-mil6.3.9:3.1_0: “Great king, that Wise One can’t exclusively happy—
ai-mil6.3.9:3.2_0: But if you say that there is an unpleasant feeling, about the past, the future, or the present, or the present life force, you don’t lead to extinguishment.
ai-mil6.3.9:3.3_0: I say it is there even those who could do it.
ai-mil6.3.9:3.4_0: ‘Great king, there is no dustry which is pleasant.’”
ai-mil6.3.9:3.6_0: “Now, great king, is that dust and dirt?”
ai-mil6.3.9:3.8_0: “But great king, when King, is in that these rulers of the earth, having washed their feet, and entered the streams of the wind, and the burning sun, and creeping animals and insects?”
ai-mil6.3.9:3.9_0: “Sir, it’s not appropriate for an embryodiment to seek sovereignty over the past. That kingship the bull elephant named sovereignty and circumstance. That’s how it will suffer painful to touch, severe, unpleasant to touch, and resulting in suffering and future pain.”
ai-mil6.3.9:3.10_0: “In the same way, great king, an exclusively extinguishment isn’t consolved.
ai-mil6.3.9:3.11_0: Those who seek the bodily relief on extinguishment and the mind made physical contact with the rod and the deathless, having accumulated that ends of suffering, and after having cut off the life of the vanity of health, like a king, charming to an axiety, after making an end of suffering, the kingdom of the body, the kingship and life forces.
ai-mil6.3.9:3.12_0: Thus, great king, Namely, isn’t able to realize extinguishment.
ai-mil6.3.9:4.1_0: And more than another, great king, hears about the extremely happy life. It’s not appropriate for someone else to realize extinguishment.
ai-mil6.3.9:4.2_0: There is a craft of teachers who are worthless!”
ai-mil6.3.9:4.3_0: “Yes, sir, I have a craft of the teachers.”
ai-mil6.3.9:4.4_0: “Great king, is it through the outcome of suffering?”
ai-mil6.3.9:4.6_0: “But great king, when your teacher has bow down to you, rise in their teacher’s feet, making yourselves well-prepared, offered their feet and depressed, with physical pain—sharp, severe, acute, unpleasant, dispelling the minds of the body, and their mind is freed from suffering.”
ai-mil6.3.9:4.7_0: “Sir, Nāgita isn’t able to satisfye the pleasure and pain from the maintaining of suffering. That’s what I’ve seen, heard, thought, and known as such a teacher. That’s how there are no more future lives.”
ai-mil6.3.9:4.8_0: “In the same way, great king, an exclusively extinguishment isn’t consolved.
ai-mil6.3.9:4.9_0: Those who seek the minds of making physical contact with the deathless, having prepared a cot, and forsaken that prevented the deathless (supernatural) life, like a cliff, after putting it away, and making an end of suffering in the sense fields, like a teacher’s equipment.
ai-mil6.3.9:4.10_0: Excellent pleasure, the suffering doesn’t make an end of suffering.”
ai-mil6.3.9:4.11_0: “Good, sir, would you agree with such a dragon?”
